name: PhaseDodger
description:
PhaseDodger

PhaseDodger is a little arcade game where you dodge blocks of the color your ship isn't but in a pinch you can PHASE your ship to the other color and keep flying! Enemy aliens wheel in from the top of the screen to keep you on your toes.

Made in 48 hours (maybe less) for PegJam2019, with the theme Parallel Worlds.

Credits:

Jonas Pagé

John Manning

Liam Berry

Mark Robitaille
